Texts.Chs: 看上去是冰，但实际上是坚固的晶体金属。
Texts.Eng: Appears to be ice, but is actually a sturdier crystalline metal.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人可以看到好多多多个自己。
Texts.Eng: Floran can see self many times in reflections.

Texts.Chs: Hexpane - 每个单独的板都由结晶金属制成。
Texts.Eng: Hexpane - each individual pane is made from a crystalline metal.
